title: Cosmic Car Key
summaries: The Cosmic Car Key is a Hardmode mount-summoning item. When used, it summons a rideable UFO that allows the player to fly and hover indefinitely. It has a 16.67*1/6 (16.67%) chance to be dropped by the Martian Saucer mini-boss during the Martian Madness event.

statistics.Sell: 5 GC
